question: On Sunday I will be 16 weeks with our second bundle of joy and today I found out I already have Preeclampsia.  In my last pregnancy,  I found out I had Preeclampsia the day before I went into labor and had our son. Usually it doesn't occur until after 20 weeks. Had any one else been diagnosed with it this early?
title: 15 weeks and already have Preeclampsia.
